article_title: TIGTA Releases Interim Report On 2016 Tax Filing Season

article_metadata.description: The Treasury Inspector General for Tax Administration (“TIGTA”) recently released an interim report detailing the 2016 tax filing season.
article_metadata.author: Timothy M. Todd
